contents: Article 21 (Acting for the Chairman's Duties) ① When the Chairman is unable to perform his duties due to an accident, the order determined by the Chairman when appointing the Vice Chairman or, if there is no designated order, the Vice Chairman shall perform his duties on his behalf in the order of seniority. However, vice presidents of foreign nationality are excluded. Revised March 23, 2017, August 7, 2017, April 25, 2018, October 6, 2021 ② If the period of acting exceeds 6 months from the date of the accident, the chairman shall be appointed within 60 days. A new election must be made. However, this does not apply to acting on behalf of a person due to suspension of duties under Article 7, Paragraph 10. Newly established 2017. 8. 7., 2021. 12. 27. ③ An agent under Paragraph 1 performs routine affairs and cannot handle affairs outside the scope of the status quo, such as policy conversion or personnel transfer, but urgent affairs. In such cases, it may be possible through resolution of the board of directors. Revised 2017. 8. 7. ④ In the event of a vacancy in the presidency, a person pursuant to paragraph (1) shall perform the duties upon approval by the Sports Council, and if the remaining term of office is more than one year, a new chairman shall be elected within 60 days. Revised 2017. 3. 23., 2018. 4. 25. ⑤ Deleted 2017. 3. 23. [Title revised 2021. 10. 6.]
